metadata.dc:author: Mar, B
Bordas, J M
Díaz-Legaspe, A J
Frías, F J
Colina, A
Goena, I
metadata.dc:description: One case of diaphragmatic posterolateral hernia (Bochdalek hernia) in a 30 years-old woman is reported. We emphasize his congenital origin, the embriological aspects and his uncommon presentation after the infancy. The clinical and diagnostic aspects and his surgical treatment are also analyzed.
metadata.dc:title: Hernia diafragmática posterolateral del adulto. Hernia de Bochdalek. A propósito de un caso.
[Posterolateral diaphragmatic hernia in adults. Bochdalek's hernia. Report of a case].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de medicina de la Universidad de Navarra
